name: Animal tower
description:
🕹How good is your dexterity? Check it out now!
🏗 Build the largest tower possible!
💎Get coins and diamonds.
🙈 Unlock 30 cute animals.
👶👩👨Game for both children and adults.

❤️ Animal Tower is a FREE game.
🧡 Easy to learn, hard to master.
💛 Choose one of two game modes: Normal or Pro
💚 Pure and simple gameplay.
💙 Select characters according to your style with many animals.
💜 Train up your brain and your reflex.
🖤 Simple but pleasant sound effects.
